title: How to Make Coffee Brownies

steps.headline: Simmer a pot of water.
steps.description: Set a metal or glass bowl over the pot (or use a double-boiler). Add 1/2 cup of butter, the regular sugar, and chocolate to the bowl. Stir frequently until the butter and chocolate have melted.

steps.headline: Dissolve 1 1/2 teaspoons of instant coffee in 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of hot water.
Add the coffee.
steps.description: Pour into the melted butter and chocolate, and mix until it is smooth.

steps.headline: Remove from heat.
steps.description: Remove the chocolate mixture from the heat and let cool until barely warm.

steps.headline: Add the eggs.
steps.description: Whisk in the 2 eggs plus 1 teaspoon of vanilla when the chocolate mixture has cooled.

steps.headline: Mix flour and salt in a separate bowl.
steps.description: Whisk this into the chocolate mixture until it is smooth.

steps.headline: Spread the chocolate mixture out into a greased baking pan.
Bake the mixture in the center of the oven for 25-35 minutes, or until the top is just set.
Combine 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) butter, 1/2 cup icing sugar and 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) cocoa powder in a small bowl.
Mix in the 1/2 tsp instant coffee, 1/2 tsp vanilla and 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) hot water.
Ice the brownies in the pan while they are still hot.

text: Brownies Preheat the oven to 325°F (160°C).  Simmer a pot of water. Set a metal or glass bowl over the pot (or use a double-boiler). Add 1/2 cup of butter, the regular sugar, and chocolate to the bowl. Stir frequently until the butter and chocolate have melted. Dissolve 1 1/2 teaspoons of instant coffee in 2 tablespoons (29.6 ml) of hot water.  Add the coffee. Pour into the melted butter and chocolate, and mix until it is smooth. Remove from heat. Remove the chocolate mixture from the heat and let cool until barely warm. Add the eggs. Whisk in the 2 eggs plus 1 teaspoon of vanilla when the chocolate mixture has cooled. Mix flour and salt in a separate bowl. Whisk this into the chocolate mixture until it is smooth. Spread the chocolate mixture out into a greased baking pan.  Bake the mixture in the center of the oven for 25-35 minutes, or until the top is just set.  Icing Combine 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) butter, 1/2 cup icing sugar and 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) cocoa powder in a small bowl.  Mix in the 1/2 tsp instant coffee, 1/2 tsp vanilla and 1 tablespoon (14.8 ml) hot water. Stir until smooth. Ice the brownies in the pan while they are still hot.  Let the brownies cool. Cut into pieces to serve. Finished.
